title: Chamki fever in Corona's havoc, first patient found in Bihar
content:
New Delhi. Right now, where Coronavirus has created panic all over the country, the knock of Chamki Fever has further increased the problem of people. Its first case has been reported in Muzaffarpur, Bihar. A child is said to have been admitted to the hospital due to chlamydia fever.

title: Supreme Court Dismisses All Review Petition Against Ayodhya Verdict in Favour of Ram Temple
content: The Supreme Court on Thursday dismissed all the review petitions challenging a Constitution Bench's order in the Ayodhya case that had cleared the way for construction of a Ram Temple at the disputed site. The top court, which took these review pleas for consideration in-chamber, rejected them af

title: All 4 accused in Hyderabad veterinarian’s rape and murder case killed in a police encounter
content:
Police have said all four accused in the rape and murder of the Hyderabad vet have been killed in an encounter. The accused were shot dead on the same highway where the body of the 26-year-old was found.
All four accused in the Hyderabad veterinarian's rape and murder case have been kille

title: Supreme Court says girls 'sex life' no cause for bail in the rape case.
content:
Furthering its consistently strong stand against sexual violence, the Supreme Court on Friday said medical evidence suggesting a victim of sexual assault is "habituated to sex" was no ground for a high court to grant bail to an accused in a rape case.

title: A Bengaluru-based startup is offering Rs 1 lakh to sleep for 9 hours during the Internship.
content: A Bengaluru-based startup is offering an incredible Rs 1 lakh for interns to sleep for 9 hours for 100 days! Wakefit Innovations Pvt. Ltd. has come up with a "sleep internship" in order to monitor people's sleeping patterns. The company website even says that the dress code for the job is "pajama

title: A Complaint has been lodged against Owaisi over his don't need charity land remark on Ayodhya verdict By Supreme Court.
content: A complaint has been lodged in Bhopal against All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (AIMIM) president Asaduddin Owaisi. Advocate Pawan Kumar lodged a complaint against the Owaisi at the Jahangirabad police station over his remarks on the Ayodhya verdict on Saturday. The complaint has been regist

title: Nirav Modi said he will kill himself if extradited to India
content:
LONDON: Jailed diamantaire Nirav Modi told a UK court on Wednesday that he was beaten up “three times” in prison and threatened to kill himself if his extradition to India is ordered, but still a UK judge refused to grant him bail.

title: Think in crore and lakhs, here is how much employees earn in companies like Google and Facebook
content: Google is the top company to work with followed by Facebook and Microsoft at second and third spots respectively. We are not saying this. title: Arrest warrant issued against Bollywood actress Ameesha Patel
content: A Ranchi court has issued an arrest warrant against Bollywood actress Ameesha Patel in a cheating and cheque bounce case, police said on Saturday. title: The woman cuts off her man’s genitals after he refuses to have sex.
content:
After a heated argument about marriage, the woman allegedly pushed the man into the bathroom and demanded that they have sex. When the man refused, she attacked him with a knife.

title: Man held for trying to rape woman on dharna
6 murders over 14 years: The Kerala housewife who killed her family for money
content:
Kerala Police Crime Branch has solved the case of serial deaths in a Catholic family in Kozhikode district between 2002 and 2016.
